tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (FRAG (NP (NNP Santorum)) (: :) (S (NP (NP (NN Fighting) (NN AIDS)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NNP Africa)))) (VP (VBZ is) (ADJP (JJ essential)))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Santorum/NNP punct>:/: parataxis>[essential/JJ nsubj>[AIDS/NN compound>Fighting/NN nmod:in>[Africa/NNP case>in/IN]] cop>is/VBZ] punct>./.]

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (JJ Humanitarian) (NN action)) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (ADJP (JJ essential) (NP-TMP (CD 2))) (JJ national) (NN security))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [security/NN nsubj>[action/NN amod>Humanitarian/JJ] cop>is/VBZ amod>[essential/JJ nmod:tmod>2/CD] amod>national/JJ punct>./.]
